slideOne.slideText: Sign up now to enjoy all portal features

slideTwo.slideText: Take a look at our available APIs

slideThree.slideText: Read the manual for a successful launch

notLoggedIn.heading: Create a developer account first.
notLoggedIn.paragraphOne: Our API Portal enables you to register a free team-based account on the fly.
notLoggedIn.paragraphTwo:
Once activated, we assist you in 3 straightforward steps to start consuming our API products.

Not sure how to get there? The onboarding documentation will help you along.

loggedIn.heading: We value you as an interested developer!
loggedIn.paragraphOne: enables you to register your client apps and subscribe to our available API products.
loggedIn.paragraphTwo:
Whenever you are ready, we assist you in 3 straightforward steps to start consuming our API products.

Did you experience any issues with your account set-up?

stepOne.paragraph:
You’ll need an app to send and receive API calls.

Adding your app details will help us to enable this flow.

stepTwo.paragraph: In the "Subscriptions" section, we provide an overview of our available Sandbox APIs your apps can subscribe to.

stepThree.paragraph: Once your app and API subscriptions are all ready to go, head to our "Getting Started" documentation for lift-off.

apiCatalog.paragraph: No APIs have been recently added.

sandboxPage.notice: {{portalName}} is maintained by {{clientName}}. You can visit us at <0>{{url}}</0>.

cookiesConsentBanner.paragraphOne: We only use cookies to enable essential website operations, and to ensure certain features work properly, like the option to log in. We do not track. Any personal information you provide to us is removed when you delete your account.
cookiesConsentBanner.paragraphThree: By clicking "I Accept", you agree to essential cookie usage.

signInOrUpView.welcomeSubtitle: Please, feel free to sign in, or sign up for free.

signInOrUpView.ssoFooterSignUp: Don't have a {{provider}} account? <0>Sign Up here.</0>

passwordRecovery.infoBoxText: If the e-mail we've just sent you does not show up on your inbox, please check your Spam or Junk folders or, ultimately, <0>contact support</0>.

noAPIProducts.subText: While we are still working on adding our API Products, you can read all of the documentation related to the portal and be ready once our API Products are launched.

greetingCard.greetingCardTextPartTwo: As Account owner, you have a personalised administrator dashboard. You also have access to account management and a slightly different navigation.

completeYourTeam.notificationCardText: Add information about your Organisation and invite team members to collaborate!

greetingCard.greetingCardText: You're at the right place if you want to set up a new client app, get informed about our API products, or have a technical question.
greetingCard.greetingCardTextAdmin: Don't find what you're looking for? Let us know, we're happy to accommodate!

notificationBanner.title: We have an important notification for you
notificationBanner.text: is sending an important notification for you here - too important to be dumped into the Assistant!

hasDataToShow.title: Subscriptions
hasDataToShow.description: By subscribing to an API product, we can inform you about any changes.
hasDataToShow.notificationText: API Subscriptions allow you to control access and to stay informed. But there’s more. Read "<0>API Subscriptions explained</0>".

steps.stepOne: Make sure all provided Organisation information is accurate
steps.stepTwo: Before you request the subscription, review all provided application data
steps.stepFour: If you revoke the subscription, make sure your app will not be impacted

clientApps.title: Client Application
clientApps.subtitle: Select target application
clientApps.infoBoxNotificationText: Subscriptions provide production access. This access request will be reviewed by {{clientName}} first.
clientApps.warningBoxNotificationText: If you revoke the subscription of the client application, access will automatically be removed.

apiProductSubsContainer.title: API product subscriptions
apiProductSubsContainer.subtitle: An API product groups multiple API versions. Each time we update a checked API product, we’ll inform you about it.

applicationsSubTab.noOrganisationWarning: You need to create an Organisation before you can create your first app. Click on the "Set up your Organisation" button above to start.

knowledgeBaseSection.title: Knowledge base
knowledgeBaseSection.launchAppCardSubtitle: Our Getting started documentation is intended to get you up to speed on the basics and running your application in no time.
knowledgeBaseSection.authFundamentalsSubtitle: We use the Open Authentication 2 standards, and you might want to know how. In the OAuth2 fundamentals we also dive into the why.

appModal.allOtherURLsError: The provided URL is not valid.
appModal.appAvatarURLError: The provided URL is not valid, or the image does not exist.
appModal.appLabelsFieldHelperText: Each provided label should be separated by a comma.
appModal.dialogText: Are you sure you want to delete this app?
appModal.existingAppNameError: An app with this name already exists in this organisation.
appModal.infoBoxSubTitleLabel: Once you understand the documentation and have provided sufficient organisation and client application information, you might want to subscribe to a few APIs in order to obtain access for your app.
appModal.subSectionLabelFour: The client credentials for <0>OAuth2 secured API access</0>.
appModal.subSectionLabelSix: You have the option to provide multiple useful links related to the application.
appModal.subSectionLabelTwo: By providing plenty of information, you increase your chances for a one-shot subscription approval by us.

customProps.infoBoxRegularText: Read more on how to optimize the use of custom properties, and check some examples in our <0>documentation</0>.
customProps.keyFieldHelperText: Maximum of 30 characters. Only lower case letters, numerals, and underscores (e.g., "key_value").
customProps.subSectionLabelSix: You have the option to provide multiple useful links related to the application.
customProps.subSectionLabelTwo: By providing plenty of information, you increase your chances for a one-shot subscription approval by us.
customProps.subtitle: You can add additional metadata to this application by way of custom properties.

warning.subText: All changes you made will be lost. Do you really want to leave without saving?
warning.text: You are about to leave this page without saving!
warning.title: Unsaved changes

errors.summaryLimit: The summary has a maximum limit of 60 characters.

stepOne.stepText: We begin by retrieving a unique token ID. We will use this token in the following requests so the API can verify your identity. Make a POST request with the parameters as shown below. Replace the variables with the Client ID and Client Secret of one of your Apps.
stepOne.stepNote: Manage and see each of your Apps' details by navigating to the "Client Applications" tab. You can find the Client ID and Client Secret under the "Access Details" section on the app's page.

stepTwo.stepText: Let's upload some data to the API by making another POST request with a JSON containing our cat's (i.e., Jack) data.

stepThree.stepText: Now we can test the API using a simplet GET request to retrieve some data.
stepThree.response: The response should look like this:

testSubTab.title: How to use and test your API
testSubTab.description: These are some quick instructions on how you can upload data to your API, and test it.
testSubTab.finalRemarksPartTwo: Now you know how to do it. That's how easy it is to get your API up and running!

overviewSubTab.subtitle: We've selected some profile-specific actions for you.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: The {{config.clientName}} Sandbox can hold an unlimited amount of API Products and API versions. The former defines the business side of an API, the latter is the technical entry, defined by OpenAPI contracts. This view enables you to automate deprecation control and give better insight in how the API’s and applications are linked together.

login.welcomeMsg: Please feel free to login or register, it's completely free!

forgotPassword.message: Enter your recovery information below and we'll send you an e-mail to recover your password

sent.message: We've sent you an e-mail so you can recover your password. Check your inbox.

team.title: Manage Team
team.subtitle:
As organisation owner, you can invite other users to your team.
If users already exists in Cloudoki’s Portal, we’ll simply invite them to join your organisation too.

removeUser.title: Remove user from team?

removeUser.subText: You may re-invite the selected user at a later time.
